name: Tale of the Bloodskull Moonstone
description:
Create your character, be it man or elf.  Visit the village of Grisrock.  Talk to the barkeep and slay goblins.  Tale of the Bloodskull Moonstone is a short fantasy adventure with goblins, eldritch entities, and a quest to solve the problems of an ailing town.

FEATURES

The game begins with a fully-featured character creation system and a virtual D10 (10-sided dice) conflict resolution mechanic.

OTHER CONTENT

This game was written in Twine (SugarCube) and is loosely based on the mechanics and setting of Instant Fantasy and Instant Fantasy: Dark Roast.

CONTROLS

The controls are what you might think.  You can read the story of each passage and click on choices where applicable.
